00088     speeds = [
00089         # Speed, Passes, Label
00090         (0, 0, 'Paused',),
00091         (1, 1, 'Ultra Slow',),
00092         (2, 1, 'Very Slow',),
00093         (3, 1, 'Slow',),
00094         (3, 5, 'Medium',),
00095         (3, 10, 'Fast',),
00096         (3, 50, 'Very Fast',),
00097         (3, 100, 'Ultra Fast',),
00098         (3, 500, 'Ridiculously Fast',),

00104     def __init__(
00105         self,
00106         engine=None,
00107         target=None,
00108         **args):
00109 
00110         gtk.Frame.__init__(
00111             self,
00112             **args)
00113 
00114         self.engine = engine
00115         self.target = target
00116 
00117         self.engine.expressInterest(
00118             self,
00119             ('speed', 'passes', 'options'))
00120 
00121         # Views
00122 
00123         hbox1 = gtk.HBox(False, 5)
00124         self.hbox1 = hbox1
00125         self.add(hbox1)
00126 
00127         spacer1 = gtk.VBox()
00128         spacer1.set_size_request(5, 5)
00129         hbox1.pack_start(spacer1, False, False, 0)
00130 
00131         vbox1 = gtk.VBox(False, 5)
00132         self.vbox1 = vbox1
00133         hbox1.pack_start(vbox1, False, False, 0)
00134         vbox1.set_size_request(200, -1)
00135 
00136         spacer2 = gtk.HBox()
00137         spacer2.set_size_request(5, 5)
00138         vbox1.pack_start(spacer2, False, False, 0)
00139 
00140         labelSpeed = gtk.Label('')
00141         self.labelSpeed = labelSpeed
00142         vbox1.pack_start(labelSpeed, False, False, 0)
00143         labelSpeed.show()
00144 
00145         scaleSpeed = gtk.HScale()
00146         self.scaleSpeed = scaleSpeed
00147         scaleSpeed.set_digits(0)
00148         scaleSpeed.set_draw_value(False)
00149         scaleSpeed.set_value_pos(1)
00150         scaleSpeed.set_range(0, len(self.speeds) - 1)
00151         scaleSpeed.set_increments(1, 3)
00152         scaleSpeed.connect('value-changed', self.speedScaleChanged)
00153         vbox1.pack_start(scaleSpeed, False, False, 0)
00154         scaleSpeed.show()
00155         self.update('speed')
00156 
00157         vbox2 = gtk.VBox(False, 0)
00158         self.vbox2 = vbox2
00159         hbox1.pack_start(vbox2, False, False, 0)
00160 
00161         spacer3 = gtk.HBox()
00162         spacer3.set_size_request(5, 5)
00163         vbox2.pack_start(spacer3, False, False, 0)
00164 
00165         self.checkButtonDisasters = gtk.CheckButton("Disasters")
00166         self.checkButtonDisasters.connect('toggled', self.doOptionsCheckbox, 'disasters')
00167         self.vbox2.pack_start(self.checkButtonDisasters, False, False, 0)
00168

00237     def update(
00238         self,
00239         name,
00240         *args):
00241 
00242         #print "MicropolisControlPanel update", self, name, args
00243 
00244         engine = self.engine
00245 
00246         if name in ('speed', 'passes',):
00247             scaleSpeed = self.scaleSpeed
00248             simSpeed = engine.simSpeed
00249             simPasses = engine.simPasses
00250             #print "SIMULATOR CHANGED SPEED/PASSES", simSpeed, simPasses
00251             found = None
00252             i = 0
00253             for speed, passes, label in self.speeds:
00254                 if ((speed == simSpeed) and
00255                     (passes == simPasses)):
00256                     if scaleSpeed.get_value() != i:
00257                         scaleSpeed.set_value(i)
00258                     print "found speed", speed, "passes", passes, "i", i, "label", label
00259                     self.setSpeedLabel(label)
00260                     return
00261                 i += 1
00262             i = 0
00263             for speed, passes, label in self.speeds:
00264                 if (speed == simSpeed):
00265                     if scaleSpeed.get_value() != i:
00266                         scaleSpeed.set_value(i)
00267                     print "found speed", speed, "any passes", passes, "current", engine.simPasses, "i", i, "label", label
00268                     if passes != engine.simPasses:
00269                         engine.setPasses(passes)
00270                     self.setSpeedLabel(label)
00271                     return
00272                 i += 1
00273             i = 3 # Default: "slow", fast speed, no skips
00274             if scaleSpeed.get_value() != i:
00275                 scaleSpeed.set_value()
00276             self.setSpeedLabel(self.speeds[i][2])
00277             print "default", i, self.speeds[i][2]
00278         elif name == 'options':
00279             self.checkButtonDisasters.set_property('active', engine.enableDisasters)
00280             self.checkButtonAutoBudget.set_property('active', engine.autoBudget)
00281             self.checkButtonAutoBulldoze.set_property('active', engine.autoBulldoze)
00282             self.checkButtonAutoGoto.set_property('active', engine.autoGoto)
00283             self.checkButtonSound.set_property('active', engine.enableSound)
00284             self.checkButtonAnimation.set_property('active', engine.doAnimation)
00285             self.checkButtonMessages.set_property('active', engine.doMessages)
00286             self.checkButtonNotices.set_property('active', engine.doNotices)
00287 
00288 
00289     def setSpeedLabel(self, label):
00290         label = 'Speed: ' + label
00291         self.labelSpeed.set_text(label)
00292 
00293 
00294     def speedScaleChanged(self, scale):
00295         engine = self.engine
00296         i = int(scale.get_value())
00297         speed, passes, label = self.speeds[i]
00298         if speed != engine.simSpeed:
00299             engine.setSpeed(speed)
00300         if passes != engine.simPasses:
00301             engine.setPasses(passes)
00302         self.setSpeedLabel(label)
00303 
00304 
00305     def doOptionsCheckbox(self, item, option):
00306         engine = self.engine
00307         flag = item.get_property('active')
00308         #print "OPTIONCHANGED", item, option, flag
00309         if option == 'disasters':
00310             engine.setEnableDisasters(flag)
00311         elif option == 'autobudget':
00312             engine.setAutoBudget(flag)
00313         elif option == 'autobulldoze':
00314             engine.setAutoBulldoze(flag)
00315         elif option == 'autogoto':
00316             engine.setAutoGoto(flag)
00317         elif option == 'sound':
00318             engine.setEnableSound(flag)
00319         elif option == 'animation':
00320             engine.setDoAnimation(flag)
00321         elif option == 'messages':
00322             engine.setDoMessages(flag)
00323         elif option == 'notices':
00324             engine.setDoNotices(flag)
00325
